metadata.title: CVE-2024-53869 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA Unified Memory driver for Linux contains a vulnerability where anattacker could leak uninitialized memory. A successful exploit of thisvulnerability might lead to information disclosure.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-535 package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
nvidia-graphics-drivers-535-server package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
